long_name: GAGES-II: Geospatial Attributes of Gages for Evaluating Streamflow
calculate suntime from UTC and site longitude
calculate DO at saturation using Garcia-Gordon equations
calculate depth from discharge and Raymond et al. 2012 equation
calculate PAR using site latitude and suntime
calculate K600 using nighttime regressions on select days
calculate baro assuming constant pressure, later to be corrected for elevation
